messages.title: Eric's Priorities
messages.content: Secure our recovery, Deliver value for money, Improve our environment, Provide more school places, Get Britain working

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tackling the debt crisis and achieving economic recovery through Conservative policy.

issues.economy: A Conservative government would reduce spending to tackle the debt crisis, not by raising taxes on hardworking families.
issues.environment: Improving our environment by planting new trees and enhancing urban spaces.
issues.health: Both locally and nationally, Conservatives will cut the deficit, not the NHS budget.

housing.content: Residents shocked by Huge Repair Bills

leaflet.personalStatement: Eric is asking for your support to continue being your strong voice in Parliament.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for Brentwood and Ongar
politicalExperience.achievements: Brought millions in investment, delivered the fastest broadband and secured finances to improve local schools and roads.

images.caption: Eric Pickles Working Round the Clock for Brentwood & Ongar.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Eric has a record of delivering for local residents and is committed to the Conservative Party's agenda.
